definitions.text: lose interest or become bored with something or somebody
examples: I'm so tired of your mother and her complaints about my food

definitions.text: exhaust or get tired through overuse or great strain or stress
examples: We wore ourselves out on this hike

definitions.text: drained of energy or effectiveness; extremely tired; completely exhausted
examples: the day's shopping left her exhausted
the trembling of his played out limbs
